Package com.example.checkers

Class OnClickListenerForPieceMoves

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.checkers.OnClickListenerForPieceMoves
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener
    public class OnClickListenerForPieceMoves
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    This class implements an onClickListener and controls the movements of the pieces.

      • onClick

        public void onClick​(android.view.View v)
        A callback function for when a piece has been clicked on.
        Specified by:
        onClick in interface android.view.View.OnClickListener
        Parameters:

      • displayMoveOptionsAndMove

        public void displayMoveOptionsAndMove​(int x,
                                      int y,
                                      boolean isBlack,
                                      boolean isKing,
                                      android.widget.ImageView pieceImage)
        Handles the callback for when a piece has been clicked. It highlights the clicked piece and calls the move() functions accordingly to the piece type (King, Red or Black).
        Parameters:
        x - The given x cord of the piece.
        y - The given y cord of the piece.
        isBlack - The color of the piece.
        isKing - A boolean indicating if the piece is a king piece or not.
        pieceImage - The piece ImageView.
